item.title: Acreage Holdings Inc 10-K
item.description: Acreage Holdings Inc, which is in the Retail-Miscellaneous Retail [5900] industry, SEC 10-K filing on March 11, 2022 had 65862 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: company - 1188 instances cannabis - 785 instances shares - 462 instances may - 444 instances financial - 401 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here.
